description: This file declares APIs and data structures related to the DS-Lite (Dual-Stack Lite) feature in a networking stack. It includes function prototypes for getting and setting boolean parameters, managing interface settings entries, and performing validation, commit, and rollback operations.

methods.name: DSLite_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves the boolean value of a specified DS-Lite parameter.

methods.name: DSLite_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets the boolean value of a specified DS-Lite parameter.

methods.name: InterfaceSetting4_GetEntryCount
methods.description: Returns the number of interface setting entries.

methods.name: InterfaceSetting4_GetEntry
methods.description: Retrieves a specific interface setting entry by index.

methods.name: InterfaceSetting4_AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new interface setting entry.

methods.name: InterfaceSetting4_DelEntry
methods.description: Deletes a specific interface setting entry.

methods.name: InterfaceSetting4_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Gets a boolean parameter value for a specific interface setting.

methods.name: InterfaceSetting4_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Gets a string parameter value for a specific interface setting.

methods.name: InterfaceSetting4_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Gets a ULONG parameter value for a specific interface setting.

methods.name: InterfaceSetting4_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter value for a specific interface setting.

methods.name: InterfaceSetting4_SetParamStringValue
methods.description: Sets a string parameter value for a specific interface setting.

methods.name: InterfaceSetting4_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets a ULONG parameter value for a specific interface setting.

methods.name: InterfaceSetting4_Validate
methods.description: Validates the interface setting parameters before commit.

methods.name: InterfaceSetting4_Commit
methods.description: Commits the changes made to interface settings.

methods.name: InterfaceSetting4_Rollback
methods.description: Rolls back changes to interface settings if validation fails.
